verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhu tāṅre kari' āliṅgana
nivṛtti kariyā kaila svacchanda gamana

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prabhu—the Lord; tāṅre—unto Him; kari'-doing; āliṅgana—embracing; nivṛtti—stop; kariyā—making; kaila—did; svacchanda—without anxiety; gamana—going toward Jagannātha Purī.
translation: Saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced Advaita Ācārya and stopped Him from following any further. Then, without anxiety, He proceeded to Jagannātha Purī.
